chunks.text:
Our Chalhoub University platform just got a brand-new look!
A modern design, a fresh feel, and a smoother experience—learning just got simpler, and more engaging. Explore the revamped interface and take charge of your development journey. 
Check it out! <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=372&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-2-min.png> 	

Congratulations our Q4 Top Learners

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=373&user=10620> 	
A big shoutout to our top Q4 learners <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=373&user=10620>  who went the extra mile in their development journey. Your dedication to continuous learning inspires us all. By embracing the power of Learning Pathways, you’ve set the example for others to follow! Keep shining and keep learning!
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

Agenda this Ramadan: Glow with ELEMIS

This Ramadan, embrace the opportunity to nurture and care for yourself in every way, starting with your skin. Embrace the spirit of self-care by indulging in the delightful ELEMIS Limited Edition Cleansing Balm Set. The Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balms trio nourishes and hydrates your skin, ensuring it stays replenished and glowing from dusk to dawn throughout the holy month.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/cb4463774bfa7102786bda2e0235c8b8900850498.gif> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-7-min.png>

This Ramadan, embrace the opportunity to nurture and care for yourself in every way, starting with your skin. Embrace the spirit of self-care by indulging in the delightful ELEMIS Limited Edition Cleansing Balm Set. The Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balms trio nourishes and hydrates your skin, ensuring it stays replenished and glowing from dusk to dawn throughout the holy month.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/cb4463774bfa7102786bda2e0235c8b8900850498.gif>

Ramadan Reflections with Tryano

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/e4f61367491a3f4cbefac9ec222a28921025944934.gif> 	

Celebrate Ramadan in style with our curated edits of timeless looks for the entire family. Visit Tryano store to experience our exclusive Ramadan activations that include a partnership with Mosaic for beautifully wrapped gifts, a Creative Corner for influencers to capture stunning moments, a Ramadan souk experience, live entertainment, and exclusive Ramadan pop ups from Self Portrait and more.


For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=374&user=10620>
